main event: An unidentified flying object was observed during a combat operation in French Morocco on September 22, 1953.
interesting points: The object exhibited an unusual bright white light larger than ordinary aircraft,The light flashed on and off several times over a period of 1 minute,The object descended and made a 59-degree turn toward the main highway before disappearing,It was estimated to be at an altitude of about 5,000 feet before vanishing,Ground radar reported no unusual contact correlating with the sighting.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
witness description: crew members of a C-47 aircraft including Lt. Colonel Wilson Moore and Lt. Frank E. MacDonald
